burlap.behavior.singleagent.vfa.common

Class LinearVFA

  • java.lang.Object
    • burlap.behavior.singleagent.vfa.common.LinearVFA
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ValueFunctionApproximation

    public class LinearVFA
extends java.lang.Object
implements ValueFunctionApproximation
    This class is used for general purpose linear VFA. It only needs to be provided a FeatureDatabase object that will be used to store retrieve state features. For every feature returned by the feature database, this class will automatically create a weight associated with it. The returned approximated value for any state is the linear combination of state features and weights.
    Author:
    James MacGlashan
